effects.display_string: Set: Blade of Justice damage increased by 15% and Wake of Ashes damage increased by 10%.
(4) Set: Wake of Ashes increases your damage done by 8% for 8 sec.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
(4) Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.
Set: Blade of Justice damage increased by 15% and Wake of Ashes damage increased by 10%.
(4) Set: Wake of Ashes increases your damage done by 8% for 8 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Increases your Mastery by 6,939 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 105,823 Nature damage over 8 sec.
